a.title: kids playing soccer in a field

img.alt: kids playing soccer in a field

div.p: Calistoga Joint Unified School District would like to welcome you to our website! Feel free to explore the web space by checking out some of our new features including calendars, news, and more. Like and follow our Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter for all things CJUSD!

div.div: Next Generation Science Standards curriculum was recently released statewide. A team from CJUSD evaluated the available resources and chose to pilot materials from Carolina-Smithsonian and Pearson at the elementary and middle school level with nine teachers participating in the pilot.
div.a: Read More About NGSS Curriculum Pilot

div.div: Fall sports in Calistoga have yet again crushed the competition and made their way into postseason success.
div.a: Read More About Wildcats Rock the Playoffs

div.div: The Calistoga Junior/Senior High School drama club put on four performances of Bocon!, a bilingual English/Spanish fable filled with humor, mysticism, and song.
div.a: Read More About Bocon Performance: Two Thumbs Up

a.title: Wildcat Success at the Tech Challenge

div.a: Wildcat Success at the Tech Challenge
div.div: This past weekend, Mrs. Brooks and her chaperones took 34 students ranging from grades 4 through 12 to the 32nd Annual Tech Challenge in San Jose. This year was a big one for our Wildcats - not only did three teams complete this year’s challenge to design and build a hovercraft that can navigate different terrains, but both a sixth grade and a high school team also won Judges’ Choice awards!
div.a: Read More About Wildcat Success at the Tech Challenge

a.title: CJUSD Hosts Another Successful Career Fair

div.a: CJUSD Hosts Another Successful Career Fair
div.div: Through the amazing support of the Calistoga Chamber of Commerce, Calistoga Promise, City of Calistoga, and Calistoga Rotary Club, students in 4th through 12th grade had the opportunity to hear from professionals representing over 20 different industries and career paths at the district's latest career fair.
div.a: Read More About CJUSD Hosts Another Successful Career Fair

a.title: Scholar Athletes Recognized with Top Honor

div.a: Scholar Athletes Recognized with Top Honor
div.div: The Calistoga Junior/Senior High School's Varsity Girls Basketball team attained the highest goal of educational athletics, combining outstanding academic performance with interscholastic athletic participation. These high school athletes have earned the North Coast Section Scholastic Championship Team Award for Winter, 2019.
div.a: Read More About Scholar Athletes Recognized with Top Honor

div.div: On January 15, the Calistoga Community Schools Initiative (CCSI) held its second partner meeting of the school year, hosting representatives from 22 public and private organizations who work with students and families in Calistoga.
div.a: Read More About Calistoga Community Schools Initiative

div.div: 1520 Lake Street, Calistoga, CA 94515 | Phone 707-942-4703 | Fax 707-942-6589
